name: Soulworker Academia
summary:
Soulworker Academia is an RPG that transports you to the universe of the successful PC game Soulworker, where you'll help these heroes complete different missions. With impressive 3D graphics, you'll move your character through eye-catching settings as you complete challenges and experience thrilling combats.

In Soulworker Academia, you can explore tons of locations in this universe, including a medical clinic, a cafeteria, and plenty of outdoor locations where you'll find other characters. In fact, not only will you find individual leagues, but you'll also have the option to compete in 3v3 combats, joining forces with players from all over the world.
